public
@xworker.html.extjs.Ext.DomHelper/@cls
sname
cls
sdescription
<p>The class attribute of the element. This will end up being either the &quot;class&quot; attribute on a HTML fragment or className for a DOM node, depending on whether DomHelper is using fragments or DOM.</p>
LvalidateOnBlur
false
LallowDecimals
false
LallowNegative
false
sdescriptors
xworker.lang.MetaDescriptor3/@attribute
